name: Shark Evolution World
description:
Raise one of the strongest predators from under the sea and evolve it along your adventure! From an ordinary shark, to Giant Shark Tornado, Alien-giant-mouth Shark, Deep-sea-phantom Shark or Machine-golden Shark - it all depends on your feeding skills!

- feed your shark and see it evolve into the king of the merciless ocean
- get more food resources through mini games
- calculate the food portion according to the evolution handbook and explore new evolution paths
- unlock all the magical sharks
